duration_raw: until the next time you make your daily preparations
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Misdirection](/Spells.aspx?ID=198)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 352 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute ([somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 2 creatures or objects
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations
</row>

</column>

---

You reshape the magic aura of one creature or object to resemble that of another. You designate one target as the primary target and the other as the secondary target. Effects that would detect auras on the primary target instead detect the same types of auras from the secondary target. A creature reading the aura can attempt to disbelieve the illusion. You can Dismiss the spell from up to a mile away.
name: Misdirection
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 352 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute ([somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 2 creatures or objects
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Cause one creature’s auras to appear to be another’s.
</summary>
summary: Cause one creature’s auras to appear to be another’s.

text: Misdirection Source Core Rulebook pg. 352 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Cast 1 minute (somatic, verbal) Range 30 feet Target 2 creatures or objects Duration until the next time you make your daily preparations --- You reshape the magic aura of one creature or object to resemble that of another. You designate one target as the primary target and the other as the secondary target. Effects that would detect auras on the primary target instead detect the same types of auras from the secondary target. A creature reading the aura can attempt to disbelieve the illusion. You can Dismiss the spell from up to a mile away.
